title: CLOSED--Over 100!--Update with lists and prices--H-o-f, SP's, a few uncommon backs--
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: CLOSED--Over 100!--Update with lists and prices--H-o-f, SP's, a few uncommon backs--
posts.post_content:
These are all ungraded, divided into pages by condition--nine pages in all--See page 4 for new additions.  They range from Poor to VG-Ex, most in the P-G range.  I've given full-page prices for most. These prices reflect a 10-15% discount, and that price is firm.

If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. Discounts for multiple items and combined shipping. 

--First to commit to a card gets it--

My PM Box is often full, so please email: [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url]

Page 1--A page of 13 Poors $178 delivered--Individually, these cards will be $13-17, delivered.

Quinn,
Maddux,
Williams, StL,
Beaumont has been SOLD----
McLean,
La Porte,
Moriarty, 
Wiltse, 
Schmidt [Note: these last three all have VG-Ex fronts, bad backs],
Bescher fielding,--SOLD----
Donlin,
Dygert,
Krause portrait,
Doolan [has a spot of paper-loss on the front; it's not obvious, being on his uniform],
Egan.

Page 2--A page of 15 P-F, $215 delivered--Individually, these cards will be $15-19 delivered--

Davis, Philadelphia,
Rhoades throwing,
Knight batting,
Krause in wind-up,
Sullivan,
Snodgrass batting,
Jones, Detroit,
Byrne,
Bowerman,
Dougherty portrait,
Hall [note punch-hole below Baltimore],
Dunn, Baltimore,
Stovall portrait,
Myers catching,
Shaw, Providence.

Page 3--A page of 12 Fairs, $185 delivered.  Individually, these cards will be $18-21 delivered--

Covaleski,
Burns,
Beck fielding,
Hemphill,
Wright,
--Abbott, OM, SOLD----
--Schmidt pitching, SOLD----
Schlafy [cracked out of a PSA 2 holder!],
Hoffman,
Smith, Buffalo,
Phillippe,
Seymour pitching,
Quinn,--TRADED--
Myers batting,
O'Leary, hands on knees.

Page 4--Eight new additions--

Guiheen, SL, $55,
Violat, OM, SL, $55--SOLD--
McGinnity, h-o-f, $44,
Clarke portrait, h-o-f-, $52,
Bradley batting, VG-Ex, $35
McAleese, Piedmont, w. speck of paper-loss on back, $19,
McAleeese, $24,--SOLD----
Camnitz in pitching motion, Piedmont 350-460. $18

Most forms of payment okay; paypal as friend; thanks.

Trading: I'd rather trade.

I am continually upgrading [looking for many hall-of-famers, SL's, SP's, Fair-Good or better, commons, G-VG or better].  I'm also looking for oddities, such as stamped-backs, and to diversify my back collection; so, if you're interested in trading, let me know what you have. I prefer ungraded cards. 

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. 
Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:

Page 5, 11 G-VG-Ex+--Individually, add $1 S/H to these cards.  Discounts for combined shipping/multiple items.
